Package com.jpaulmorrison.fbp.core.components.io

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EnhancedWriteFile
    Component to write data to a file, using a stream of packets.
    ListFiles
    Component to step through a directory, generating two streams of packets: - directories go to port DIRS - files go to port FILES The file name is specified as a String via an InitializationConnection.
    ReadEmails
    Component to read data from Thunderbird Inbox file, generating a stream of emails.
    ReadFile
    Component to read data from a file, generating a stream of packets.
    ReadFromSocket
    Component to read data from socket, generating a stream of packets.
    WriteFile
    Component to write data to a file, using a stream of packets.
    WriteToSocket
    Component to write data to a socket, using a stream of packets.
